title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง LI 9.3 - Transfer agents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง LI 9.3 - Transfer agents

State Regulations

It is the opinion of the department that a corporation
organized under the Business Corporation Law may not act as transfer agent in
this State. DATED: November 6, 1976

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
LI 9.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
